page.title: 10THE GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: IN SCHOOL WE PLAY MANY DIFFERENT GAMES.IN THE LUNCH TIME OR PLAYTIMES SOME GIRLS PLAY SKIPPING (I DON'T) WHILE THE BOYS PLAY BALLTAG.THEY ONLY START PLAYING THIS IN THE SUMMER SEASON.OTHER DAYS THEY JUST SIT AROUND DOING NOTHING.IN THE WINTER THE GIRLS PLAY NETBALL WITH MRS JARRETTS CLASS. IN THE SUMMER ONE OF OUR LESSONS IS LONGBALL OR ROUNDERS.WE PLAYED AGAINST MRS JARRETTS CLASS 2 OR 3 TIMES AND THEY WON ALL THE TIME.(OUR CLASS ARE STILL SKILL THOUGH.)BOTH GAMES ARE QUITE SIMILAR EXCEPT IN ROUNDERS YOU RUN ROUND AND IN LONGBALL YOU RUN UP AND DOWN.AT HOME SOME FRIENDS AND MYSELF PLAY DANISH LONGBALL.THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THIS AND LONGBALL IS THAT IN DANISH LONGBALL YOU RUN A FURTHER DISTANCE.MY FAVOURITE GAME IS LONGBALL,IT'S HAYLEY_JANES AS WELL.
